dict.acceptation: 到处，处处，无论什么地方；四下里；漫；匝地；

sent.orig: Here there's movement everywhere people everywhere cars and bikes everywhere!
sent.trans: 上海到处都是人，到处都是车。

sent.orig: It must nestle everywhere, settle everywhere, establish connexions everywhere.
sent.trans: 它必须到处落户，到处开发，到处建立联系。

sent.orig: If he sends reinforcements everywhere, he will everywhere be weak.
Some persons can be everywhere at home; others can sit amusingly at home and be everywhere.
sent.trans: 有些人可以四海为家地无拘无束，也有些人可以静坐家中而神游四海。

sent.orig: The army commands trust everywhere but the Netherlands, and the police do so everywhere but Bulgaria.
sent.trans: 军人在荷兰以外的地方信任度都较高；警察在除了保加利亚以外的地方信任度较高。
